thread.title: YES! Immediately After Being Sworn In, Trump Makes One BIG Change to the Oval Office…
thread.title_full: YES! Immediately After Being Sworn In, Trump Makes One BIG Change to the Oval Office…

author: Nickarama
title: YES! Immediately After Being Sworn In, Trump Makes One BIG Change to the Oval Office…
text:
The U.S. and Britain have always had a “special relationship” as politicians would describe it. 
We have been the closest of friends and have always had each other’s back in international affairs. 
One recognition of that was the bust of British Prime Minister Winston Churchill in the Oval Office. 
President Obama removed the bust and replaced it with busts of Abraham Lincoln and Martin Luther King when he became President in 2009. 
This was taken as a snub by some here and in the United Kingdom. 
Since its removal, Republicans, including Trump, promised to get it back in the Oval Office if they had the opportunity. 
From Washington Times: 
On his first day in office, President Trump brought back a bust of the legendary British prime minister to the West Wing, after President Obama had removed it. Mr. Obama replaced it with a bust of Martin Luther King Jr. 
Reporters who were summoned to the Oval Office Friday night to witness Mr. Trump signing an executive order noticed the Churchill bust had been returned to the Oval Office. 
Media initially mistakenly said that the bust of Martin Luther King had been removed and replaced with Churchill, but that was based on a mistaken report. The King bust is still there. 
Nice that a candidate finally keeps a promise… LIKE this article?
